channel.title: GoodBye To A Good Guy
channel.description:
You see what I done there? :P
Anyway, it is time to mourn. Bigmac, a respected member of the moparisthebest community, has retired from the Mopar forums to go and create his own forums.
Bigmac was a nice guy and was respected by a lot of people down in the Graphics Section and generally in the community, but it is time to say goodbye to him. He started to find that these forums were getting repetitive and he didn't get what he felt when he first joined.
Bigmac was a good guy, to me, and a lot of other people. He helped out a lot with the newbies. I will miss him here.
Goodbye Bigmac have a good time elsewhere :)

YOUR NY FAVORITE FOOD! I MEAN WHO DOESNT LIKE THE SPECIAL SAUCE!

item.title: GoodBye To A Good Guy
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“bigmac, post:22, topic:17104”]Thankyou all, but i don’t feel good about this atall now. I feel i have pushed mr.chris into leaving. Even though he has a very valid reason for leaving, which he can’t say. I know i pushed him that extra bit.
I feel really bad about this And now there is no mod for graphics. Nobody will live upto Mr.Chris’s reputation here.
On another note. I have my first GCSE in 3 days. My I.C.T one. If i feel i have done good i will return here until my next. But only * I emphesise ONLY * if i feel i have done my absolute best.
Or i shall not return in a while. Until i feel i have what it takes.
My future is more important than some online forums. Even though many of you are very nice people. I just feel i need to study harder and spend more time doing important things.
Thanks again anyone who posted. And goodbye for now :)[/quote]

Bye, Bigmac. Yes, your future is more important than being on forums. I spend too much time on the computer, but I should spend the time focusing on my schoolwork and spending time with family. It is sad to see that you and Mr.Chirs are leaving. I will add you to msn today.

Good luck on your test.

~Leader

Read full topic

Thankyou all, but i don’t feel good about this atall now. I feel i have pushed mr.chris into leaving. Even though he has a very valid reason for leaving, which he can’t say. I know i pushed him that extra bit.
I feel really bad about this And now there is no mod for graphics. Nobody will live upto Mr.Chris’s reputation here.
On another note. I have my first GCSE in 3 days. My I.C.T one. If i feel i have done good i will return here until my next. But only * I emphesise ONLY * if i feel i have done my absolute best.
Or i shall not return in a while. Until i feel i have what it takes.
My future is more important than some online forums. Even though many of you are very nice people. I just feel i need to study harder and spend more time doing important things.
Thanks again anyone who posted. And goodbye for now

item.title: GoodBye To A Good Guy
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

Thanks Chris, anyway all i have to say is, thanks for anyone who actually did enjoy my company the time i have been here. And i may return in the long distant future, I have retired as of I have had feeling that certain people don’t like me here. And i don’t feel very welcome.
Also as Chris said, it is just to repetetive every day for me.
Another reason for retiring is because i need to spend more time on my school/coursework so i can get better grades in my GCSE’s
I might login the odd time to see how the community is going. But i will not be posting im afraid.

And for any of you idiot who are going to flame me for leaving or whatever, please don’t even take up posting space.

Thankyou to everyone in the graphics section who helped me find my way around. And i felt most comfortable in the graphics board.

And a big thanks to Flamed fury1 and Mr.Chris for being my biggest guides through my journey here.

So it’s a big goodbye from me, and see you another time guys???

Read full topic
